head.content: Lead data-driven decisions with Data Science

desc.content: Data science application is an in-demand skill in many industries worldwide — including finance, transportation, education, manufacturing, human resources, and banking. Explore data science courses with Python, statistics, machine learning, and more to grow your knowledge. Get data science training if you’re into research, statistics, and analytics.

coursees.header: Data Science A-Z™: Real-Life Data Science Exercises Included
coursees.description: Learn Data Science step by step through real Analytics examples. Data Mining, Modeling, Tableau Visualization and more!

coursees.header: Machine Learning, Data Science and Deep Learning with Python
coursees.description: Complete hands-on machine learning tutorial with data science, Tensorflow, artificial intelligence, and neural networks

coursees.header: Data Science: Deep Learning and Neural Networks in Python
coursees.description: The MOST in-depth look at neural network theory for machine learning, with both pure Python and Tensorflow code

coursees.header: R Programming A-Z™: R For Data Science With Real Exercises!
coursees.description: Learn Programming In R And R Studio. Data Analytics, Data Science, Statistical Analysis, Packages, Functions, GGPlot2

coursees.header: Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp with R
coursees.description: Learn how to use the R programming language for data science and machine learning and data visualization!

coursees.header: R Programming: Advanced Analytics In R For Data Science
coursees.description: Take Your R & R Studio Skills To The Next Level. Data Analytics, Data Science, Statistical Analysis in Business, GGPlot2

coursees.header: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp
coursees.description: Learn how to use NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn , Matplotlib , Plotly , Scikit-Learn , Machine Learning, Tensorflow , and more!

coursees.header: Python A-Z™: Python For Data Science With Real Exercises!
coursees.description: Programming In Python For Data Analytics And Data Science. Learn Statistical Analysis, Data Mining And Visualization

coursees.header: Machine Learning A-Z™: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science
coursees.description: Learn to create Machine Learning Algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts. Code templates included.

coursees.header: Introduction to Machine Learning for Data Science
coursees.description: A primer on Machine Learning for Data Science.  Revealed for everyday people, by the Backyard Data Scientist.

coursees.header: SQL & Database Design A-Z™: Learn MS SQL Server + PostgreSQL
coursees.description: Learn Both SQL Server & PostgreSQL By Doing. Enhance Your Data Analytics Career With Real World Data Science Exercises

coursees.header: Data Science : Master Machine Learning Without Coding
coursees.description: Learn Fundamentals Of Data Science & Machine Learning With Rapidminer (No Coding). Dataset & Solutions Included.
